greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominator of (sum of divisors of n / number of divisors of n).
comment: a(n) = 1 when n is listed in A003601, a(n) > 1 when n is listed in A049642. - _Alonso del Arte_, Jan 31 2006
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: a(12)=3 since the 6 divisors of 12 are 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 and 12 and 1+2+3+4+6+12=28 and 28/6=14/3.
program: a057021 n = denominator $ a000203 n % a000005 n
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jul 21 2000
